document.masterDocTitle: Annotated catalogue of the carabid beetles of the Republic of Macedonia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated catalogue of the carabid beetles of the Republic of Macedonia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Carabus coriaceus cerisyi Dejean, 1826
[= hopffgarteni (Kraatz, 1877 ); emgei Ganglbauer, 1888 ] References.
Carabus coriaceus cerisyi n. emgei
:
Breuning 1978
: 270
.

( cerisyi ) emgei :
Drovenik & Peks 1994
: 15
;

: 18
.
Carabus coriaceus emgei :
Pavičević & Mesaroš 1997
(South-East Macedonia ); Mitev et al. 2010 : 43 (Kožuf: Marjanska Planina).
Carabus coriaceus cerisyi :
Guéorguiev 1998
: 39
(Stracin)
.
Lazarevska & Mitkova 2000

(ssp.) hopffgarteni :

: 68
(eastern Macedonia ).

Carabus coriaceus coriaceus Linnaeus, 1758
[= banaticus L. Redtenbacher, 1849 ; weiratherianus Breuning, 1936 ]
